name: Roundhill BITKRAFT Esports & Digital Entertainment ETF
description: The Roundhill BITKRAFT Esports & Digital Entertainment ETF (GAMR) is an innovative exchange-traded fund that provides investors with exposure to the rapidly growing esports and digital entertainment sector. Launched in 2020, GAMR aims to track the performance of the BITKRAFT Esports Index, which comprises companies involved in the esports ecosystem, including game developers, streaming platforms, and hardware manufacturers. The ETF is designed to capitalize on the increasing popularity of esports and gaming, as well as the emergence of digital entertainment as a mainstream form of leisure. Roundhill Investments, the issuer of GAMR, focuses on providing strategies that embrace the convergence of technology and entertainment. With the global esports market projected to reach billions in revenue, GAMR offers a unique opportunity for investors to tap into the future of entertainment, benefiting from trends such as live streaming, competitive gaming, and interactive experiences. The fund is diversified across various companies, including those involved in game publishing, tournament organizing, and content creation, making it an appealing option for investors looking to gain exposure to this dynamic and growing industry.

seo.meta_description: Invest in the future of gaming with the Roundhill BITKRAFT Esports & Digital Entertainment ETF (GAMR), providing exposure to leading companies in the esports and digital entertainment sectors.

faq.answer: GAMR is an exchange-traded fund that provides exposure to the esports and digital entertainment industries.

faq.question: Who manages GAMR?
faq.answer: GAMR is managed by Roundhill Investments.

faq.question: What is the investment focus of GAMR?
faq.answer: GAMR focuses on companies involved in the esports ecosystem, including game developers, streaming platforms, and hardware manufacturers.
